Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.compliance

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBreachEvent
    IBreachEvent is an interface defining a filter breach instance.
    IBreachNotifier
    IBreachNotifier is an interface through which a compliance filter or a filter state controller can notify that a breach has occurred.
    IClientEntityMapper
    IClientEntityMapper is an interface to be implemented when it is required to execute certain rules against sub-client entities.
    IComplianceFilter
    IComplianceFilter is an interface implemented by all compliance filters.
    IComplianceFilterSetContainer
    IComplianceFilterSetContainer is a container of filter sets.
    IComplianceStateFulFilter
    Interface of filters having an IClientEntityMapper attribute.
    IConfigurableReference  
    IFilterContainer
    IFilterContainer is an interface implemented by containers of IComplianceFilter objects.
    IFilterStateController
    IFilterStateController is an interface describing a filter state controller.
    IReferenceable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConcurrentOrderFilter
    Abstract base class for filters that count the number of orders in the market.
    AbstractFilterStateController
    AbstractFilterStateController is an abstract base class implemented by all filter state controllers.
    BreachEvent
    IBreachNotifier is an interface through which a compliance filter or a filter state controller can notify that a breach has occurred.
    ComplianceFilter
    ComplianceFilter is an abstract base class implemented by all compliance filters.
    ComplianceFilterSet
    ComplianceFilterSet is a compliance filter that is responsible for checking basic message validity, populating the context and then applying all enabled filters.
    ComplianceFilterSetDictionary
    ComplianceFilterSetDictionary is a dictionary of ComplianceFilterSets.
    ComplianceProcessor
    The ComplianceModule component provides coordination of ASX Business Rules validation for DMA.
    ComplianceUtil  
    ConcurrentOrderFilter
    ConcurrentOrderFilter is a compliance filter that checks that there are no more than a specified number of concurrent orders in the market in the given security.
    ConcurrentOrderFilterStateController
    ConcurrentOrderFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing numbers of concurrent bids and offers.
    ConcurrentOrderMgr
    ConcurrentOrderMgr is a utility class that keeps tracks of the number of concurrent bid and ask orders in a security by a client.
    ConcurrentOrderMgr.OrderCount
    OrderCount is a container for holding bid and ask order counts.
    DefaultClientEntityMapper
    DefaultClientEntityMapper is a default implementation of the IClientEntityMapper interface which simply uses the client CompID.
    ExposureFilter
    GrossExposureFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the cummulative order value is no more than a specified limit.
    ExposureFilterStateController
    ExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing exposure.
    ExposureMgr
    ExposureMgr is a utility class that keeps track of the accumulated gross and net exposure for various clients.
    ExposureMgr.ExposureData
    The ExposureMgr.ExposureData class holds exposure counts for a client.
    FilterConfigurationLoader
    FilterConfigurationLoader loads XML filter configuration data for the ComplianceProcessor.
    FilterStateControllerContainer
    AbstractFilterStateController is an abstract base class implemented by all filter state controllers.
    FromFixFilterContext
    FromFixFilterContext holds the necessary context within which a ComplianceFilter can be evaluated.
    GrossExposureFilter
    GrossExposureFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the cummulative order value is no more than a specified limit.
    GrossExposureFilterStateController
    GrossExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing gross exposure.
    GrossTradeExposureFilter
    GrossTradeExposureFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the cummulative trade value is no more than a specified limit.
    GrossTradeExposureFilterStateController
    GrossTradeExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing gross trade exposure.
    InadvertentCrossingFilter
    InadvertentCrossingFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the client does not have an order on the opposing side for a given security.
    MarketModeFilter
    MarketModeFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the market is in one of a set of certain modes.
    NetExposureFilter
    NetExposureFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the cummulative order value is no more than a specified limit.
    NetExposureFilterStateController
    NetExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing net exposure.
    NetTradeExposureFilter
    NetTradeExposureFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the cummulative trade value is no more than a specified limit.
    NetTradeExposureFilterStateController
    NetTradeExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing net trade exposure.
    OrderValueFilter
    OrderValueFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the order value is no more than a specified maximum order value limit and no less than a specified minimum order value limit.
    OrderValueMgr
    OrderValueMgr is a utility class that maintains an in-memory cache of order values by client order id across all clients.
    PercentageFromAuctionPriceFilter
    PercentageFromAuctionPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified percentage away (measured as an absolute value) from the indicative auction price.
    PercentageFromBestPriceFilter
    PercentageFromBestPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified percentage away (measured as an absolute value) from the best price (on the same side).
    PercentageFromLastPriceFilter
    PercentageFromLastPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified percentage away (measured as an absolute value) from the last traded price.
    PercentageFromMarketPriceFilter
    PercentageFromMarketPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified percentage away (measured as an absolute value) from market price (best price on opposite side).
    PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter
    PercentageFromReferencePriceFilter is a base implementation for a range of compliance filters that check that the order is no more than an specified percentage away from a reference price.
    PriceStepsFromAuctionPriceFilter
    PriceStepsFromAuctionPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified number of price steps away (measured as an absolute value) from the indicative auction price.
    PriceStepsFromBestPriceFilter
    PriceStepsFromBestPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified number of price steps away (measured as an absolute value) from the best price (on the same side).
    PriceStepsFromLastPriceFilter
    PriceStepsFromLastPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified number of price steps away (measured as an absolute value) from the last traded price.
    PriceStepsFromMarketPriceFilter
    PriceStepsFromMarketPriceFilter is a compliance filter that checks for the order is no more than an specified number of price steps away (measured as an absolute value) from market price (best price on opposite side).
    PriceStepsFromReferencePriceFilter
    PriceStepsFromReferencePriceFilter is a base implementation for a range of compliance filters that check that the order is no more than an specified number of price steps away from a reference price.
    PriceToleranceTable  
    PriceToleranceTableEntry  
    PriceToleranceTableReference  
    SecurityFilter
    SecurityFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the security is not one of a set of embargoed securities.
    SecurityTypeFilter
    SecurityTypeFilter is a compliance filter that checks that the security has one of a range of security types.
    ToFixFilterContext
    ToFixFilterContext holds the necessary context within which a filter state controller can be evaluated.
    TradeExposureFilterStateController
    TradeExposureFilterStateController is a filter state controller for managing exposure.
    TradeExposureMgr
    TradeExposureMgr is a utility class that keeps track of the accumulated gross and net trade exposure for various clients.
    TradeExposureMgr.TradeExposureData
    The TradeExposureMgr.TradeExposureData class holds exposure counts for a client.
    ValidityFilter
    ValidityFilter is a special compliance filter that checks that the validity of the message passed.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CompoundFilterBreachException
    FilterBreachException is an exception class for notifying filter breaches.
    FilterBreachException
    FilterBreachException is an exception class for notifying filter breaches.
